name: XRFrame.getViewerPose
description: The getViewerPose() method, a member of the XRFrame interface, returns a XRViewerPose object which describes the viewer's pose (position and orientation) relative to the specified reference space.

refs.name: WebXR Device API
refs.description: The definition of 'XRFrame.getViewerPose()' in the 'WebXR Device API' specification.
